data.name: Birmingham Party Bus Trip
data.description:
Come and join us for a fun night out at Birmingham Pryzm! We’ll be departing from campus at 22:30 via the Party Bus to Birmingham and arriving back at 3:45am. Tickets are £15 for pick up & drop off and include free entry to the club! 

(Transport from Leamington Spa tbc) 
Use the promo code ENGSOCWARWICK at checkout!

data.name: Christmas Market Trip
data.description: Join us for an amazing EngSoc Birmingham Christmas Markets trip this Sunday to get in the festive spirit! We will be leaving from campus and meeting at Coventry train station to depart at 14:30. Alternatively, you can also meet us at Birmingham New Street station at 14:52. During the day, we will be shopping, stopping off at coffee shops and exploring all the different stalls on offer in the evening!
